name: ColorMe - Painting Book
description:
Here comes the coloring book that can be painted freely. Now download it to play your creativity.

ColorMe has a large number of different types of line drawings to meet your painting needs. This is a color painting game that both adults and children like. It can give full play to everyone's creativity and painting ability, cultivate the perception and matching ability of color, and achieve great sense of achievement when completing each painting.

ColorMe has no restrictions. It can paint freely and has no internal purchase. It will unlock two thread manuscripts for free every day. After finishing the daily painting task, it will get diamonds. Use diamonds to unlock your favorite thread manuscripts in advance. This will give children more motivation and goals, and let them adhere to and develop good creative habits.

The use of ColorMe is very simple. You only need to select a color and click on the map block to paint. It also supports the enlargement of the line draft, which is more convenient for painting. It requires enough patience to complete each painting. Once the creation is completed, you will get an unparalleled sense of achievement and honor. You can save your paintings on your mobile phone or share them with your family and friends and share your happiness with them.

I wish you can have your own peace and fun in the process of painting.
